description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a4a7d","text":"In this experiment, the flower immersion method was used to transfer the target gene into Arabidopsis thaliana using Agrobacterium mediated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o6ar","text":"In this experiment, the flower immersion method was used to transfer the target gene into Arabidopsis thaliana using Agrobacterium mediated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29elj","text":"YEB liquid medium, LB medium, 0.1 M CaCl2, 0.05 M MgSO4, flower immersion buffer (0.5XMS, 5% sucrose, 0. 03% Silwet L-77), Rif, Kan.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5gnmm","text":"Shaker, centrifuge, culture bowl, greenhouse, trays, plastic film.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"877a","text":"1. Preparation and transformation ofAgrobacterium tumefaciensreceptor cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":36,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs45f","text":"(1) Pick a single colony of GV1301 in 10 ml of YEB or LB liquid medium and incubate with shaking at 28°C until late logarithmic phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22bnh","text":"(2) Add 0.5 ml of bacterial solution to 50 ml of fresh YEB or LB liquid medium and incubate at 28°C with shaking until OD600=0.5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":121,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tls5","text":"(3) Transfer to 50 ml centrifuge tube and ice bath for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adnnp","text":"(4) Transfer to a 50 ml centrifuge tube and ice bath for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bto3u","text":"(5) Centrifuge at 4000 rpm for 10 min at 4°C and collect the organisms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec8kb","text":"(6) Resuspend the precipitate with 8 ml of pre-cooled 0.1 M CaCl2and 0.05 M MgSO4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":64,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":80,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gb0g","text":"(7) Centrifuge at 4000 rpm for 10 min at 4°C and collect the bacteriophage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j650","text":"(8) Take 200 ul of receptor cells, add 0.5 ug of plasmid and mix gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46drm","text":"(9) Freeze in liquid nitrogen for 50 s, place on ice for 40 min, and heat-excite at 42°C for 90 s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65nma","text":"(10) Add 800 ul of LB medium and incubate for 1 hour at 28°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vl04","text":"(11) Apply the appropriate amount of cells on the screening medium and blow dry the surface liquid on the ultra-clean table.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sm2c","text":"(12) Incubate at 28°C for two days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiuq9","text":"2. Transformation ofArabidopsis thalianaby flower immersion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3au4","text":"(1) Inoculate Agrobacterium clones containing expression vectors in 5 ml YEB medium (containing 100 ug/ml Rif, 100 ug/ml Kan) at 28°C, 200 rpm and incubate with shaking overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmkf1","text":"(2) Transfer to 200 ml YEB medium at a ratio of 1:50 and incubate at 28°C, 200 rpm for 5 hours; centrifuge at 5000 X g for 15 min and collect the bacteriophage; resuspend in floral immersion buffer (0.5XMS, 5% sucrose, 0. 03% Silwet L-77) and adjust OD600to 0.8.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":252,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a8f0","text":"(3) Place the Arabidopsis culture bowl upside down on a suitable size container containing flower soaking buffer, soak for 3-5 min, remove the culture bowl upside down in a tray, cover the tray with plastic film, remove the film after 24 hours, and continue the culture in the greenhouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Transformation of Arabidopsis Thaliana Protocol
